padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1730331" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lavenderdeerling"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1656621"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1656621.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lavenderdeerling" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1730331ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1730331" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1656621">lavenderdeerling</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-10">01/10/23 10:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very beautiful, a bit sweet but not too much. A very rich and smooth incensey amber without any acrid or bitter note that can come with smokier fragrances. Powerful but not headache inducing, honestly just the right amount of power for me. It invokes a bit of mystery, but is also velvety and comforting. I don't find it to be super spicy, just a bit in the background. This smells wonderful on my husband but I think it's fairly unisex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1730331"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1730331#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1720613" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1720613" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iszzieanna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234905"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1234905.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iszzieanna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1720613ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1720613" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234905">iszzieanna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-29">12/29/22 23:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens with a blast of incense. Reminding me of smoke from a fire-breathing dragon. After this, it mellows into a very quiet Tonka, playdoh-powder vanilla with coca cola. There are times when I think why didn’t I buy this? But the longevity and the combo of notes speaks for itself</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1720613"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1720613#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1710828" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1710828" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ularewolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/461474"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.461474.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ularewolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1710828ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1710828" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/461474">ularewolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-16">12/16/22 15:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I still need to test it more, but this is quite nice. It is very similar to Spiritueuse Double Vanille by Guerlain, clearly inspired by it. However, this has more "body" to smell than SDV does. This warrants more sampling to garner my full thoughts.<br />
<br />
Currently: I like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1710828"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1710828#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1705664" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1705664" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lithohydrobio"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1237458"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1237458.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lithohydrobio" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/DS-Durga/Salem-Gothic-86328.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.86328.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Salem Gothic"title="Salem Gothic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1705664ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1705664" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1237458">lithohydrobio</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-09">12/09/22 14:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Majesty in a bottle. Great for a night out. For reference, the dry sweet ambery accord is top shelf. I perceive an accord akin to Escada Magnetism (dry cola) with a touch of vanilla from Dior Homme Intense (vintage 2010 version specifically) but much less amped and more subdued. This smells more of a watery tonka/cola. The absolute key here is that dusty/old english transparent DNA that Penhaligons has. This frag is linear and maintains its fiery whispy translucent glowing red aroma from start to finish, overall I would label it highly addicting; very light, yet greatly aromatic. I imagine some people perceive the incense more than others and that’s awesome. Penhaligons does a fantastic incense. I'm not sure about smelling baby powder, this is masculine and dry and exudes class.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1705664"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1705664#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1700868" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1700868" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SweetBriar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1018716"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1018716.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SweetBriar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Guidance-78656.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78656.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guidance"title="Guidance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1700868ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1700868" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1700868"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1700868#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1671063" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1671063" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KingerFD"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1540883"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1540883.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KingerFD" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1671063ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1671063" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1540883">KingerFD</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-21">10/21/22 09:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Incense sandalwood vanilla. Smells like a nicer blend of this is him that doesn’t dry down to a powdery smell. Very light vanilla finish at the end</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1671063"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1671063#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1659714" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1659714" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SmellMyCheese"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171159"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1171159.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SmellMyCheese" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1659714ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1659714" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171159">SmellMyCheese</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-05">10/05/22 13:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Far too soft a fragrance imho, it's a musky light vanilla with a touch of incense and an aftersmell of tonka. Like SDV watered down to 1/3 the regular concentration.<br />
If this was amplified a bit more I think it would be very nice but it's far too light and not that original for the price of the portraits line. <br />
<br />
I don't like my wear-in-public fragrances to be "beast mode" personally but this is more like "meek mode".</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1659714"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1659714#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1651156" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1651156" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scentine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1210646"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1210646.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="scentine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1651156ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1651156" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1210646">scentine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-23">09/23/22 06:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The incense is very soft and doesn't create much of a contrast so the composition definitely comes across as more of a powdery, musky amber rather than a spicy one. Sadly the performance and sillage are terrible. I had the same experience with Changing Constance, so I'm wondering if this might be a common denominator for the whole portraits collection. If I hadn't tested these at the official counter at a perfumery, I would have suspected that it's a fake. The dragon is kind of a weird choice for such a weak fragrance. It smells very nice, but it's so overpriced for how poorly it performs that it's kind of offensive.<br />
<br />
If you're looking for alternatives that smell very similar but perform much better, I would suggest Grand Soir by MFK, Material by Amouage or Ambre Lumiere by Molinard. The first two are softer and more vanillic, the latter perhaps less sweet and a bit more spicy. All three have good longevity and projection in my experience.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1651156"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1651156#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1588175" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1588175" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Professor Value"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171228"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1171228.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Professor Value" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nicolai-Parfumeur-Createur/New-York-Intense-28180.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28180.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="New York Intense"title="New York Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1588175ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1588175" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171228">Professor Value</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-20">06/20/22 12:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very pleasant fragrance with excellent performance. IMO, it smells similar to PdM's Herod but heavier with a vanilla-incense lean. I'd surmise that owning both might be redundant unless one likes this twist and believes it is sufficient differentiation.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1588175"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1588175#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1582553" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; easily enjoyable!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1582553"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1582553#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1578769" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1578769" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BAF85"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1507166"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1507166.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BAF85" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1578769ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1578769" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1507166">BAF85</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-06">06/06/22 07:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Vanilla incense that turns more sweet, powdery musk as time passes. Vanilla, incense and ambrette are the star players here. Not remotely spicy to my nose or very complex. Pleasant fragrance, certainly wouldn’t offend anyone, but not particularly special. Description and advertising do not match the actual perfume, this is not a fragrance I would associate with a dragon, unless it were a cuddly, animated one.<br />
<br />
Fragrance does still have Penhaligon’s level of quality and is well blended. Just definitely not their best.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1578769"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1578769#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1566867" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1566867" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cherry_Darling"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1003821"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1003821.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cherry_Darling" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Pascal-Morabito/Perle-Pour-Elle-47506.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47506.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Perle Pour Elle"title="Perle Pour Elle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1566867ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1566867" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1003821">Cherry_Darling</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-19">05/19/22 04:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great smoky toasty vanilla scent. Not overly sweet like Yasmine of the line, even though vanilla is pretty dominant. The sage adds just a touch of herbal and could easily be lavender also. Really nice, sweet toasty vanilla frag, one of my favourite types of smells. Easily feminine / unisex. <br />
<br />
** 200 samples for swap - UK - check my customs, get in touch! **</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1566867"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1566867#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1564538" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1564538" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vrapjr123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1343812"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="vrapjr123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lacoste-Fragrances/L-Homme-Lacoste-Intense-50828.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50828.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Homme Lacoste Intense"title="L'Homme Lacoste Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1564538ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1564538" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1343812">vrapjr123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-15">05/15/22 13:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It just doesn’t have enough depth to it..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1564538"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1564538#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1553136" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1553136" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Groyserc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258135"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1258135.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Groyserc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1553136ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1553136" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258135">Groyserc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-29">04/29/22 02:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am a big fan of Penhaligon's Portraits collection, but I was a bit disappointed in this fragrance. Its a lovely smell don't get me wrong, but its a less punchy version of Tobacco Vanille. For being a dragon I was expecting something more punchy, smoky, spicy. To me it doesn't scream dragon at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1553136"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1553136#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1552106" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1552106" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aznbcool"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/387877"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="aznbcool" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Royal-Crown/Celebration-11906.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11906.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Celebration"title="Celebration"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1552106ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1552106" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/387877">aznbcool</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-27">04/27/22 13:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I smelt this in the mall and it completely blew me away from the presentation to the smell itself. Don’t listen to the other reviewers who think it should be spicy etc and more dragon like or have it be oriental. Being Asian it reminds me of Chinese New Year when my parents would light up incense put up city’s fruits and almond cookies, candy etc for the gods. It’s a clean gourmand that’s perfectly balanced and has a <br />
powdery few to it; absolutely stunning and delicious</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1552106"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1552106#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1543668" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1543668" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Q80"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/698615"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.698615.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Q80" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1543668ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1543668" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); <br />
It is like Guerlain's "Double Vanilla", &amp; "Grand Soir" by MFK. It was fine when i first sprayed it but when it cooled down then it goes to something i've usually sniffed before. Ok.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1543668"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1543668#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1532568" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/518579">Calvini</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-29">03/29/22 01:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really? For a Chinese dragon motif they couldn't have made it a spicy incense with Sichuan pepper or add symbolic flowers like peony, plum, or lotus? I almost bought one just for the bottle cap (same reaction when George the stag first came out)...I love all of these bottles so much but have not found one worth buying 😩 with the closest being Sohan and maybe Yasmine</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1532568"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1532568#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1527682" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1527682" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Voice-Of-God"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1207310"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1207310.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Voice-Of-God" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1527682ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1527682" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1207310">Voice-Of-God</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-21">03/21/22 13:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Deary deary me! The comment that this "smells like a vanilla flavoured condom" hits the nail right on the head. ;) I am loathe to leave bad reviews but this is more overpriced 'all style and no substance' nonsense from Penhaligon's. You'd need to be off your rocker to pay £210.00 for 75ml of this weak, synthetic smelling concoction. <br />
<br />
<b>CONCLUSION | </b> ★<br />
If 'Halfeti' can be likened to George Clooney then 'The World According to Arthur' is a doppelganger for Shane MacGowan. ;)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1527682"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1527682#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1527357" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1527357" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gleeeeen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1411966"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1411966.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gleeeeen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55442.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Heartless Helen"title="Heartless Helen"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1527357ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1527357" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1411966">gleeeeen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-21">03/21/22 03:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's such an amazing scent, but has the projection of a office fragrance which is disappointing. However if you have the cash to spend on this fragrance to consistently reapply then this is a fragrance for you</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1527357"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1527357#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1515842" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1515842" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ohcontraire"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1422358"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ohcontraire" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jennifer-Lopez/One-69243.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69243.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="One"title="One"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1515842ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1515842" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1422358">ohcontraire</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-03">03/03/22 12:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening is a blast of caramel-sweet vanilla joined by a dark, smoky incense and something almost savoury (the clary sage i think). No sign of any grapefruit or even any citrus fruitiness AT ALL, i didn't see that listed as a note on Penhaligon's either. On the verge of being intensely, unpleasantly smoky for the first few minutes, but eventually settles into a very powdery vanilla with that strange savoury note still definitely present. I SO BADLY wanted this to be the smoky vanilla of my dreams but this aint it. The weird savoury note does dissipate after a couple of hours and all you're left with is a SWEET, baby-powdery vanilla and bit of musk, no incense, no smoke, no... wow factor and not even a yummy, creamy, luxe and edible type vanilla - something about this smells synthetic. Disappointing. <br />
<br />
Silage is moderate, lasting power isn't terrible on me (still detectable at arms length after 6 hours) but I have to agree with some other reviewers in that there is a screechy, plasticky note in here that lasts FOREVER (great if you like it) and gets annoying very quickly. Definitely not a safe blind buy and probably not work-safe either (job dependant, obviously).<br />
<br />
My overall impression, between the rubbery plastic note and the synthetic smelling sweetness, is of a vanilla flavoured condom (sorry Penhaligon's, ily really!).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1515842"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1515842#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1513531" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1513531" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Houdini4"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.607493.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Houdini4" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Indemodables/Vanille-Havane-Coeur-de-Oud-96892.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96892.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"title="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1513531ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1513531" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493">Houdini4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-28">02/28/22 06:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm left scratching my head about the 'reminds me of' section here, but that's why it's an opinion and it's also not called 'smells like' because to it's credit I don't think this directly smells like anything else. <br />
However, that's not to say it's good because I'm more than disappointed with it, I'm pretty mortified if the truth be told. While the composition itself has unique nuances, it comes from a genre I like to call, '...loud shouty incense, smashed together with vanilla and or tonka.'<br />
The opening is quite nice, sweet, spicy smoked, resinous but that vanillic aspect starts to grow and the whole thing just grates on me, personally. <br />
I can take good things from it, I do like these kind of modern resin perfumes but I just can't seem to wear them without being fatigued and this hits a really sore, pitchy note, almost immediately.  <br />
The tenacity is INSANE!!! Especially for a Penhaligons and they do take some stick for this line being a bit weak in that department. <br />
The caps and packaging generally on these are cool, and if the brand can maintain it's sales to Joe Bloggs through releasing in this signature line then fine, but perfume lovers (certainly me and others I talk to) want and expect a bit more. I think the classic/legacy fragrances from Penhaligon's are much better, but that's not to say there aren't a couple of creative ones in this collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1513531"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1513531#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1509581" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1509581" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Eckhardt Lee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414647"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1414647.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Eckhardt Lee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Gentle-Fluidity-Gold-53401.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53401.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gentle Fluidity Gold"title="Gentle Fluidity Gold"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1509581ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1509581" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414647">Eckhardt Lee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-22">02/22/22 05:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Penhaligon's really have to improve their vanilla fragrances in general. Both Babylon and this new one give me a plasticky smell. A good vanilla scent should be able to avoid becoming too plasticky while remaining its exclusive sweetness and creaminess. Especially at this overpriced price point, I cannot find myself loving it even I am such a big fan of Penhaligon's fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1509581"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1509581#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1509502" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1509502" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gbvfx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406062"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="gbvfx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1509502ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1509502" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406062">gbvfx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-22">02/22/22 02:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love Penhaligon's and it pains me to say this is a massive let down. I'm struggling to smell anything after spraying, but what I do get is germolene mixed with vanilla and a hint of smokiness. I had a sample of halfeti delivered the same time which is a masterpiece, comparing the two is night and day in terms of smell and longevity</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1509502"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1509502#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1508894" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1508894" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kraken"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1244801"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kraken" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Myrrh-Tonka-42027.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42027.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Myrrh & Tonka"title="Myrrh & Tonka"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1508894ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1508894" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1244801">Kraken</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-21">02/21/22 04:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As with almost all penhaligons, yes it’s pricey,plus the longevity and silage isn’t great.<br />
<br />
But the ingredients are class and the smell is amazing.<br />
<br />
This is a subtle spicy scent that is very warm and cosy.<br />
It’s strange because it borders on gourmand, but just stops short. <br />
It smells completely different, but it gives me the same feeling as wearing casamorati italica. <br />
If nothing else it’s intriguing, comforting and puts a smile on my face.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1508894"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1508894#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1508851" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1508851" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mr_bigmem"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1134861"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mr_bigmem" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gio-Absolu-48138.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48138.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Giò Absolu"title="Acqua di Giò Absolu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1508851ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1508851" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1134861">mr_bigmem</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-21">02/21/22 02:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've been spraying this on my wrists at different times of the day for a week to see how it wears fresh and when reapplied. And overall while I love the scent i'm left really disappointed with the longevity and sillage. So even with top quality ingredients and with this big price Penhaligons should have done so much better. This drops of my skin like a $5 pharmacy cheapie. The scent is intriguing me,  I'm getting something so familiar from this from the first spray and all through to the dry down. I'm not just talkin about notes but something in the combined accords. I can't put my finger on it but i'm getting something that is like blending different parts from JPG LeMale,  PR 1Million and PR Ultraviolet. While the composition works really well as a whole its just a major let down in how long it lasts and the poor projection, and even as a skin scent it starts to fade away so quickly. Save your money folks nothing to get excited about here</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1508851"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1508851#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1486207" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1486207" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="OctavianWho"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1354757"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1354757.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="OctavianWho" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sarah-Baker-Perfumes/Peach-s-Revenge-90749.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90749.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Peach's Revenge"title="Peach's Revenge"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1486207ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1486207" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);     <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1552106" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1552106" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aznbcool"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/387877"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="aznbcool" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Royal-Crown/Celebration-11906.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11906.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Celebration"title="Celebration"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1552106ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1552106" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/387877">aznbcool</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-27">04/27/22 13:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I smelt this in the mall and it completely blew me away from the presentation to the smell itself. Don’t listen to the other reviewers who think it should be spicy etc and more dragon like or have it be oriental. Being Asian it reminds me of Chinese New Year when my parents would light up incense put up city’s fruits and almond cookies, candy etc for the gods. It’s a clean gourmand that’s perfectly balanced and has a <br />
powdery few to it; absolutely stunning and delicious</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1552106"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1552106#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1908492" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1908492" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AhmedElbahja95"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1793463"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1793463.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AhmedElbahja95" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1908492ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1908492" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1793463">AhmedElbahja95</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-22">08/22/23 06:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The perfume itself is very nice, but it falls massively on it's face in the performance department. I love Arthur by Penhaligon's, but I wouldn't buy it again. Only because I feel it's too expensive for the lack of performance. I give this 7/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1908492"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1908492#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1812760" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1812760" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Luke.Swan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1628416"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1628416.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Luke.Swan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-9828.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9828.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus"title="Aventus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1812760ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1812760" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1628416">Luke.Swan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-19">04/19/23 12:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just recently got into this house and Arthur was my first pick. I ended up buying a high partial and i'm not disappointed in the slightest. It's a beautiful fragrance with a huge dose of incense, vanilla, and musk. It's a linear scent as I don't get much development throughout. It's a super high quality fragrance. It's worth 200+ for me but probably not others. <br />
<br />
The longevity is great at around 8-9 hours on my skin but the projection is poor. Very light projection which I personally like because I needed a lighter, office safe, inoffensive winter fragrance. IMO it's the best portraits bottle by miles. I find it a full unisex fragrance. A must smell if you're a fan of incense. <br />
<br />
Smell 10/10 <br />
Performance (5/10)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1812760"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1812760#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2079064" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It is very similar to Spiritueuse Double Vanille by Guerlain, clearly inspired by it. However, this has more "body" to smell than SDV does. This warrants more sampling to garner my full thoughts.<br />
<br />
Currently: I like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1710828"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1710828#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="71646" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>

You'd need to be off your rocker to pay £210.00 for 75ml of this weak, synthetic smelling concoction. <br />
<br />
<b>CONCLUSION | </b> ★<br />
If 'Halfeti' can be likened to George Clooney then 'The World According to Arthur' is a doppelganger for Shane MacGowan. ;)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="71646"comment_id="1527682"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-World-According-to-Arthur-71646.html?ccid=1527682#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1509502" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
